info.title: Inkeep Chat API
info.description: Complete REST API for Inkeep Chat application including chat completions, A2A agent communication, and comprehensive CRUD operations for all entities

example.name: Customer Support Agent
example.description: An AI agent specialized in handling customer support inquiries and resolving customer issues
example.instructions: You are a helpful customer support agent. Be polite, professional, and empathetic. Help customers resolve their issues efficiently while maintaining a friendly tone. If you cannot resolve an issue, escalate it appropriately.

example.name: Customer Support Agent

example.name: Customer Support Agent
example.description: An AI agent specialized in handling customer support inquiries and resolving customer issues
example.instructions: You are a helpful customer support agent. Be polite, professional, and empathetic. Help customers resolve their issues efficiently while maintaining a friendly tone. If you cannot resolve an issue, escalate it appropriately.

example.name: Enhanced Customer Support Agent
example.description: An improved AI agent specialized in handling customer support inquiries with enhanced problem-solving capabilities
example.instructions: You are an enhanced customer support agent with access to advanced tools. Be polite, professional, and empathetic. Use available tools to look up customer information, order history, and process refunds when appropriate. Always aim to resolve issues on the first contact.
